entry.en:
Pilgrim
You are blessed to walk the foundations of Pharloom.
Humble yourself before the shells of those who gave their lives to hold our kingdom’s weight.
entry.zh:
朝圣者
行走于纺络根基是你的殊荣。
在这些为王国献出生命者的躯壳前，应保持谦卑。

entry.en: <hpage>You are wrong, Lady...<hpage>I knew the wish, and the price to achieve it. And now, across these many ages, I have only come to know it better...<hpage>Strength... in mind, in care, in claw. Strength enough that I may live to see a world better than our own, or to craft a world as I desire. <hpage>That was the wish, of my mother, of my mentor, and of you...<page>...Indeed, spider... So much pain you must have passed to speak our hope so simply...<page>For her you become... who knows clear our desire, and has seen full the darkness beneath our house, I would show you the gift...
entry.zh: <hpage>您错了，夫人……<hpage>我知道您寄望于我，也知道达成这期愿的代价。历经岁月后，如今的我的看法愈发透彻……<hpage>心志、仁念、爪牙——皆需刚强。强大到能让我亲眼见证美好世界之降临，强大到能助我亲手创造一个理想世界。<hpage>此乃生母、恩师与您的共期之愿……<page>……诚然，小蜘蛛……你一定历经了不可估量之苦痛，才得此彻悟……<page>既然你已经成长……明晰我们的期愿，也见识过我们家园下深藏的黑暗……我这便将礼物赠予你……

entry.en:
Coral sways,
Clear water flows,
Upon our river free of time.
entry.zh:
珊瑚轻摇，
净水长流，
河流超脱时光之外。

entry.en: ...Arrived... At last...
...Our Silk...

Witness, the first light. The only means we possess to resist that void with which our family is forever linked.<page>Reach forth, child grown strong. Wrest it from this remembrance. Burn yourself free from our sad fate...
entry.zh: 来吧，见证这道最初的光芒。这是我们抵御虚空的唯一手段。而那虚空，却与我们的族群永世相连。<page>伸出手来，我的孩子，你已通过历练变得强大。在这忆境中夺取那光芒，焚尽我们悲惨宿命的枷锁……

entry.en: ...Our strength...
...Our nature...
...One to wish our waking...

...Ignore them, daughter... their whispers...<page>...Greater, grander... Weaver, guardian, queen... Those are their desires... not your own. Certainly not mine...<page>...Only if you resist them, you might see it, another hope... beyond...<page>...But to recall these words, in time so far... Will you even remember me, child? Could you?...<page>...A mother... before the mask... before I lay forever in duty...
entry.zh: ……莫听，女儿……她们的絮语……<page>……伟大……崇高……织者、守护者、女王……皆为他们所欲……非你所求，更非我所愿……<page>……唯有抵抗，方可见……另一线希望……<page>……但时过境迁，这些话……你可会记得？你可会记得我？...<page>……作为母亲，在戴上面甲之前……在因责任而永眠之前……

entry.en: ...Show us your craft, child...<page>...Show it splendid, as only we can teach...<page>...Prove yourself more Weaver than Wyrm...
entry.zh: ……展现你的技艺，孩子……<page>……展现那唯有我等能传授的绝技……<page>……证明自己更像织者，而非沃姆……

entry.en:
At water’s source,
And coral’s heart,
Our lord born last to rule.
entry.zh:
水源尽头，
珊瑚心核，
末生之主将临。

entry.en: ...She called us daughters... Called us divine... She lied...
entry.zh: ……她称我们为女儿……称我们为天选……皆是谎言……

entry.en: ...Child... Weaver...
...One mind... One union...
...Child... Spider...
...Alas... spider’s child...<page>...For our ways you will think us harsh... You will think us uncaring, unrepentant...<page>...And so we must seem, for such is the cost of our wish...
entry.zh: ……唉……蜘蛛之子……<page>……你必定认为我等冷酷……认为我等无情且固执……<page>……但我等必须如此，此为实现期愿之代价……

entry.en: ...Their memory...
...Bind their shells...
...Their voices... Their song...
...Raise them... Up...
...To devote... Eternal...
...Bind their souls...
...Bind them all...
...She called us daughters... She called us divine...
entry.zh: ……她称我们为女儿……称我们为天选……

entry.en: ...We are life... We are growth... What world without us?...
entry.zh: ……我等即生命……我等即生长……无我则世如荒土……

entry.en: ...Rise... Rise...
...Come, child... Witness our waking...

...Good... Better...<page>...Yet still you will need to be faster...<page>...In time, they will come for you... Those who fear your nature, and those seeking to claim it...<page>...To survive our world, you must learn to sting... swift and sudden...
entry.zh: ……尚可……精进……<page>……你仍需更快一些……<page>……终有一日，畏惧你本性者将至……欲夺你本性者将至……<page>……欲存于世，须学蛰刺……快如闪电……

entry.en: ...Our claws to crush... Our claws to rule... Our claws to save them all...
entry.zh: ……以爪粉碎……以爪统治……以爪拯救众生……

entry.en: ...To dance... And love... And end... Together...

Pilgrim
May these fields of flame sear away all impurity.
That you be granted ascendance to the verdant lands above.
entry.zh:
朝圣者
愿这烈焰原野焚尽一切污秽。
赐你升入苍翠之地的权利。

entry.en: ...Better a child spun mad... than none...
entry.zh: ……宁要癫狂之子……也好过膝下无子……

entry.en: ...Sisters... spiders... our song sustains...
...Better a child spun frail... than none...
entry.zh: ……宁要脆弱之子……也好过膝下无子……

entry.en: ...Better a child spun pure... than them...
...They are ours... Bound forever...
...For her light... eternal... our song sustains...
...We feel it...

We speak the wish of the Master Herald,
he who signs an Age’s end.
Under chapel fallen to the monarch’s might,
Over camp collapsed to the black thread plight,Scorched field on edge, shells black and burned,
Up towers spinning, near the surgeon spurned,Cage of one who raged against the silken lie,
Fell heart of frost, who soars on high,Past cradle’s peak, last test of fitness,
That the age may pass, this shroom its witness.
entry.zh:
此乃使者大人祈愿，
宣告纪元终结到来。圣堂倾颓君威下，
骸营覆灭黑丝劫。焦土边际髓骨灼，
纺塔孤医灰沼别。囚笼首罪逆丝客，
霜心振翼费岳阙。 摇篮极顶终试炼，
菌主临鉴纪元歇。

entry.en: ...How we hunted... How we sang... My children, I saw you glorious...
entry.zh: ……昔日狩猎……昔日咏唱……我的孩子，我曾见你们辉煌……

entry.en: ...From our Silk... A child born loyal...
<hpage>So, the Herald visits this land too...<hpage>If he is here, now, then great change or a savage end is inevitable. He would care to see nothing else...
entry.zh: <hpage>使者竟也踏足此地……<hpage>若他在此现身，巨变或浩劫将无可避免。除此之外，他目空一切……
